info.title: python
info.intro: Data Science, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Deep Learning...
info.description: The data says a lot about things, and learning from the data has incredible possibilities.
info.text:
Cleaning, treat and organizing the data it with a critical sense is the fundamental part of machine learning. 
With well-structured data, imagination with libraries like tensorflow, keras, scikit-learn and others, has no limits in applications.

info.title: R
info.intro: Data Analysis, SQL, Data visualization, Data cleaning...
info.description: Data can tell stories, where it comes from, what it looks like and where to start.
info.text:
Data visualization is a fundamental step to guide the story that will tell, a good representation is a compass for the reality of their distribution.
 In addition to visualization, hypotheses are tested on samples with statistical power to better understand the behavior of a reality close to the observed one, thus being able to listen to the world in different ways.

info.title: javascript
info.description: Good applications for reality involve interacting with a simple interface to document or use to interact with new ideas.
info.text:
Languages such as html, css and javascript provide a variety of possibilities in creating content rich in creativity.
 libraries like React.js make complex systems simple with functions useful for scalable web, desktop and even mobile applications, improving person-computer interaction.
In the handling of information traffic, tools used in conjunction with node.js, there is an incredible position in multi-threaded tasks, in the possibility of making several parallel applications for the creative and informative social development of ideas.
